overview: Prior to AisleBuyer, Dan Preston was CTO at Photrade.com. Dan has published three major research papers in data mining and machine learning. As a postgraduate research assistant at Harvard, he developed a method to analyze data from billions of stars to discover interesting events such as microlensing and exosolar planets. His work at Tufts, on redefining data classes used for scientific research, is having direct impact on research in the Department of Geography and Environment at Boston University.
